summary.span: 为定位和编辑 XML 数据提供游标模型。

span.span: Provides a cursor model for navigating and editing XML data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类中命名空间是一个抽象类，它定义用于导航和编辑 XML 信息项作为 XQuery 1.0 和 XPath 2.0 数据模型的实例的游标模型。The class in the namespace is an abstract class which defines a cursor model for navigating and editing XML information items as instances of the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model. 从实现的类创建对象如和类。An object is created from a class that implements the interface such as the and classes. 创建的对象对象为只读时创建的对象可以编辑的对象。 objects created by objects are read-only while objects created by objects can be edited. 使用确定对象的只读或可编辑状态属性的类。An object's read-only or editable status is determined using the property of the class. 有关处理使用 XPath 数据模型的 XML 数据的详细信息，请参阅[使用 XPath 数据模型处理 XML 数据](~/docs/standard/data/xml/process-xml-data-using-the-xpath-data-model.md)主题。For more information about processing XML data using the XPath data model, see the [Process XML Data Using the XPath Data Model](~/docs/standard/data/xml/process-xml-data-using-the-xpath-data-model.md) topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于使用而引发的异常类，如类中，可能包含不应在不受信任的方案中公开的敏感信息。Exceptions raised as a result of using the class, such as the class, may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios. 应正确处理异常，以便在不受信任的情况下不公开此敏感信息。Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios.

span.span: Returns an object used to create one or more new child nodes at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于在当前节点的子节点列表的末尾创建新的子节点。

span.span: An object used to create new child nodes at the end of the list of child nodes of the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加子节点会将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending child nodes adds the new nodes to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果元素有三个子节点，则第一个追加的节点将成为第四个的子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the first appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 新的子节点不会插入直到方法的调用对象。The new child node is not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 方法是仅当位于根节点或元素节点。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . 可以将多个节点写入编写器。You can write more than one node to the writer. 所有节点已都附加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。All nodes are appended to the end of the list of child nodes of the current node. ## Examples 在以下示例中，一个新`pages`子元素追加到的子元素的第一个列表`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件中使用返回对象方法。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加的子节点将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果元素有三个子节点，则追加的节点将成为第四个的子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 若要创建新的元素节点，请在 XML 字符串参数中包括所有 XML 语法。To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter. 一个新的字符串`book`节点是`AppendChild("")`。The string for a new `book` node is `AppendChild("")`. 将文本"book"追加到当前节点的文本节点的字符串是`AppendChild("book")`。The string for appending the text "book" to the current node's text node is `AppendChild("book")`. 如果 XML 字符串包含多个节点，将添加所有节点。If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法是仅当位于根节点或元素节点。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，在 `pages` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表上追加新的 `contosoBooks.xml` 子元素。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#2)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加的子节点将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果元素有三个子节点，则追加的节点将成为第四个的子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果对象定位在 XML 节点的序列，将添加在序列中的所有节点。If the object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added. - 方法是仅当位于根节点或元素节点。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，一个新`pages`子元素追加到的子元素的第一个列表`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件中使用指定的对象。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object specified. `http://www.contoso.com/books` ，以便使用相同的命名空间与 XML 文档追加新的子元素指定命名空间。The `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace is specified so that the new child element is appended using the same namespace as the XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 追加的子节点将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的末尾。Appending a child node adds the new node to the end of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果对于元素节点有三个子节点，追加的节点将成为第四个的子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element node, the appended node becomes the fourth child node. 如果不存在子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 可以通过使用获取 Namespace 前缀和 URI 值方法或方法。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the method or the method. 例如，以下语法使用范围内命名空间追加的子元素`xmlns:bk=http://www.contoso.com/books`:For example, the following syntax appends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk=http://www.contoso.com/books`: ```csharp navigator.AppendChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 这将创建新的子``元素。This creates the new child `` element. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀`null`或，然后从当前命名空间范围内获取命名空间 URI 的新元素的前缀。If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or , then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内没有命名空间前缀，则会自动生成的命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated. - 方法是仅当位于根节点或元素节点。The method is valid only when the is positioned on the root node or an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，在 `pages` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的子元素列表上追加新的 `contosoBooks.xml` 子元素。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is appended to the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#5)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#5)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联网的 XML 文档的聚合使用各种 W3C 标准包含机制的数据块组成，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data, aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms, and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. DTD 实体是一个示例演示的这种聚合数据，但并不局限于 Dtd。DTD entities are an example of this aggregated data, but it is not limited to DTDs. 属性告诉您这些节点源自。The property tells you where these nodes originate from. 例如，如果从加载 XML 数据`http://server/mydata.xml`，则属性返回`http://server/mydata.xml`。For example, if the XML data is loaded from `http://server/mydata.xml`, the property returns `http://server/mydata.xml`. > [!NOTE] > 使用创建节点类具有相同作为 XML 文档从创建的。Nodes created using the class have the same as the XML document the was created from.

[!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CPP/xpathnavigatorproperties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CS/xpathnavigatorproperties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorProperties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/VB/xpathnavigatorproperties.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `books.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `books.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 方法验证 XML 数据中包含遵守全局类型或在或中提供的多个架构中声明。The method verifies that the XML data contained in the conforms to a global type or declaration in the schema or schemas provided in the . - 方法不执行信息集增加。The method does not perform infoset augmentation. 这意味着不会应用架构默认值，、 文本值不会转换为原子值，并且没有新的类型信息与信息项相关联。This means that schema defaults are not applied, text values are not converted to atomic values, and no new type information is associated with information items. - 架构`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`中的 XML 数据的提示将被忽略。Schema `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` hints in the XML data of are ignored. - 如果定位在文档节点上，验证过程包括唯一性和引用约束的检查 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，并`xs:unique`)。If the is positioned on a document node, the validation process includes checking of uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`). 否则，将忽略这些检查。Otherwise, these checks are omitted. - 如果传递参数原样`null`并定位在元素节点，公开的类型信息属性的属性用来检查节点的有效性。If the passed as a parameter is `null` and the is positioned on an element node, the type information exposed by the property's property is used to check the node's validity. 如果传递参数原样`null`并位于根节点，使用的文档元素 （即，根节点的元素子级） 属性。If the passed as a parameter is `null` and the is positioned on the root node, the property of the document element (that is, the element child of the root node) is used. 在这两种情况下如果元素的属性属性是`null`并参数原样传递`null`、因为没有类型信息以用于执行引发验证。In both cases if the property of the element's property is `null` and the passed as a parameter is `null`, an is thrown because there is no type information to use to perform validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了枚举。The following table describes the enumeration. |XmlNodeOrderXmlNodeOrder|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||当前节点的这所提供的当前节点之前。The current node of this is before the current node of the supplied .| ||当前节点的这是所提供的当前节点之后。The current node of this is after the current node of the supplied .| ||这两个对象定位在同一个节点上。The two objects are positioned on the same node.| ||节点位置不能按文档顺序确定相对于彼此或`null`指定为参数。The node positions cannot be determined relative to each other in the document order, or `null` is specified as the parameter. 如果两个节点驻留在不同的树中，则可能发生这种情况。This could occur if the two nodes reside in different trees.| 方法的行为是依赖于当前所处。The method's behavior is dependent on the the is currently positioned on. 在比较 XML 文档中的节点时，以下规则适用：When comparing nodes in the XML document, the following rules apply: - 节点：将源文档中按文档顺序返回这些节点。 nodes: These nodes are returned in document order from the source document. - 节点：这些节点可能按文档顺序返回，并且始终之前父元素的节点。 nodes: These nodes may be returned in document order and are always before the nodes of the parent element. - 节点：可能按文档顺序返回这些节点。 nodes: These nodes may be returned in document order. 随时后节点和父节点的任何子节点之前。They always come after the nodes and before any child nodes of the parent node. > [!NOTE] > 有关 XPath 数据模型的详细信息和有关每个节点类型的详细信息，请参阅第 5 节的 W3C [XML 路径语言 (XPath)](https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath/all/#data-model)建议。For more information about the XPath data model and details about each of the node types, see section 5 of the W3C [XML Path Language (XPath)](https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath/all/#data-model) recommendation. 此方法不起作用的状态。This method has no effect on the state of the . > [!NOTE] > 使用方法而不是方法在可能的情况。Use the method rather than the method when possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Namespace 前缀和 URI 值可以使用获取或方法。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the or method. 例如，以下语法创建一个属性使用范围内命名空间`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:For example, the following syntax creates an attribute by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ```csharp editor.CreateAttribute(navigator.Prefix, "attributeName", LookupNamespace(navigator.Prefix), "text") ``` 这将创建新属性``当前元素上。This creates the new attribute `` on the current element. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀或`null`，从当前命名空间范围内获取命名空间 URI 的新属性的前缀。If the namespace prefix specified is or `null`, the prefix for the namespace URI of the new attribute is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内没有命名空间前缀，会自动生成的命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, a namespace prefix is automatically generated. 例如，若要创建新的属性的默认命名空间中的元素上`contosoBooks.xml`文件中，(`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`)，则指定`null`或为命名空间前缀和命名空间 URI 参数。For example to create a new attribute on an element in the default namespace of the `contosoBooks.xml` file, (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`), you specify `null` or for both the namespace prefix and namespace URI parameters. 指定`http://www.contoso.com/books`命名空间 URI 作为参数将导致方法为自动生成新属性的命名空间前缀。Specifying `http://www.contoso.com/books` as the namespace URI parameter will cause the method to auto generate a namespace prefix for the new attribute. - 如果创建的新特性发生冲突，与在元素上的命名空间声明或者因为另一个命名空间声明在同一范围内，使用选择的命名空间前缀的命名空间节点，或者因为选择的前缀都是相同的元素但不绑定到不同的命名空间 URI，将引发异常。If the new attribute created is a namespace node which conflicts with a namespace declaration on the element, either because the namespace prefix chosen is used by another namespace declaration at the same scope, or because the prefix chosen is the same as that of the element but is bound to a different namespace URI, an exception is thrown. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，一个新`discount`上创建属性`price`的第一个子元素`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件。In the following example, a new `discount` attribute is created on the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#7)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#7)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 当定位在元素上，创建的新属性方法放在当前元素的属性列表的末尾。When the is positioned on an element, the new attributes created by the method are placed at the end of the attribute list of the current element. - 新属性则不会插入直到方法的调用对象。The new attributes are not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀或`null`，从当前命名空间范围内获取命名空间 URI 的新属性的前缀。If the namespace prefix specified is or `null`, the prefix for the namespace URI of the new attribute is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内没有命名空间前缀，会自动生成的命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, a namespace prefix is automatically generated. 例如，若要创建新的属性的默认命名空间中的元素上`contosoBooks.xml`文件中，(`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`)，则指定`null`或为命名空间前缀和命名空间 URI 参数。For example to create a new attribute on an element in the default namespace of the `contosoBooks.xml` file, (`xmlns="http://www.contoso.com/books"`), you specify `null` or for both the namespace prefix and namespace URI parameters. 指定`http://www.contoso.com/books`命名空间 URI 作为参数将导致方法为自动生成新属性的命名空间前缀。Specifying `http://www.contoso.com/books` as the namespace URI parameter will cause the method to auto generate a namespace prefix for the new attribute. - 如果创建的新特性发生冲突，与在元素上的命名空间声明或者因为另一个命名空间声明在同一范围内，使用选择的命名空间前缀的命名空间节点，或者因为选择的前缀都是相同的元素但不绑定到不同的命名空间 URI，将引发异常。If the new attribute created is a namespace node which conflicts with a namespace declaration on the element, either because the namespace prefix chosen is used by another namespace declaration at the same scope, or because the prefix chosen is the same as that of the element but is bound to a different namespace URI, an exception is thrown. - 返回对象仅可用于创建属性。The object returned may only be used to create attributes. 调用其他不创建属性的对象方法将引发异常。Calling other object methods that do not create attributes throws an exception. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，使用从 `discount` 方法返回的 `currency` 对象在 `price` 文件中第一个 `book` 元素的 `contosoBooks.xml` 子元素上创建新的 和 属性。In the following example, new `discount` and `currency` attributes are created on the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks - 定位在已删除的节点的父节点上成功删除。The is positioned on the deleted node's parent node on successful deletion. - 如果已删除的节点是文本节点，这是简单类型化元素的内容，在元素丢失其类型信息。If the deleted node is a text node which is the content of a simple typed element, the element loses its type information. 这意味着，当定位在元素上，并属性具有值`null`，和分别。This means that when positioned on the element the , and properties have the values `null`, and respectively. - 已删除的节点是否仍可以访问置于其上它们在删除之前的对象。Deleted nodes are still accessible to objects positioned over them prior to deletion. 但是尝试将从已删除的子树移开的方法将失败。However methods that attempt to move away from the deleted sub-tree fail. 例如，并方法将始终失败时定位在顶级最已删除的节点上。For example, the and methods always fail when the is positioned over the top most deleted node. 这是因为已删除的节点不再连接到的 XML 文档。This is because the deleted node is no longer connected to the XML document. 同样时，方法始终会失败位于最底层的已删除节点上。Similarly the method always fails if the is positioned on the bottom-most deleted node. ## Examples 在下面的示例`price`的第一个元素`book`的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件将被删除使用方法。In the following example the `price` element of the first `book` element of the `contosoBooks.xml` file is deleted using the method. 在 元素删除之后，`price` 对象的位置位于父级的 `book` 元素上。The position of the object after the `price` element is deleted is on the parent `book` element. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#9)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#9)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks Namespace 前缀和 URI 值可以使用获取或方法。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the or method. 例如，以下语法将同级元素插入使用范围内命名空间`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:For example, the following syntax inserts a sibling element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ```csharp navigator.InsertElementAfter(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 这将创建新的同级``元素。This creates the new sibling `` element. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀`null`或，然后从当前命名空间范围内获取命名空间 URI 的新元素的前缀。If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or , then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内没有命名空间前缀，则会自动生成的命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated. - 方法是仅当定位在元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中的新`pages`元素插入后`price`的第一个子元素`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件。In the following example a new `pages` element is inserted after the `price` child element of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#22)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#22)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类以相反的文档顺序返回命名空间节点。The class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order. 因此， 实质上移到当前在范围内的最后一个命名空间节点。Therefore, essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope. 例如，使用以下 XML 片段，如果上定位`data`节点，按以下方式的行为。Using the following XML fragment as an example, if the is positioned on the `data` node, behaves in the following manner. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` 将移动到以下命名空间节点之一： `xmlns:c='C'`， `xmlns:a='A2'`， `xmlns=''`， `xmlns:b='B'`，或`xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, `xmlns:b='B'`, or `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` 将移动到以下命名空间节点之一： `xmlns:c='C'`， `xmlns:a='A2'`， `xmlns=''`，或`xmlns:b='B'`。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, or `xmlns:b='B'`. - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` 将移动到`xmlns:c='C'`节点。`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` moves to the `xmlns:c='C'` node. ```xml ``` 如果当前未定位在元素上，则此方法返回`false`的位置和不会更改。If the is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the does not change. 之后已被移动到命名空间节点，属性反映的命名空间名称。After the has been moved to the namespace node, the property reflects the name of the namespace. 当定位在命名空间节点，方法上， ，和不适用。When the is positioned on a namespace node, the methods , , and are not applicable. 这些方法始终返回`false`且不会更改的位置。These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the . 相反，可以调用移到下一步的命名空间节点。Rather, you can call to move to the next namespace node. 之后定位在命名空间节点，调用才能返回到元素节点。After the is positioned on an namespace node, call to move back to the element node. 命名空间节点的定义，请参阅第 5.4 节的 W3C [XML 路径语言 (XPath)](https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath/all/#data-model)建议。For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C [XML Path Language (XPath)](https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath/all/#data-model) recommendation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 如果作为参数传递的边界不定位在当前的位置后它将被忽略。If the boundary passed as a parameter is not positioned after the position of the current it is ignored. - 如果边界参数是`null`，按文档顺序查找具有的本地名称和命名空间 URI 指定的以下元素。If the boundary parameter is `null`, the following element with the local name and namespace URI specified is located in document order. - 方法不能用于移动到属性或命名空间节点。The methods cannot be used to move to attribute or namespace nodes. 如果边界作为某个属性或命名空间节点置于一个参数传递的它相当于边界参数具有定位在其父元素的第一个子节点上。If the boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element. 这可确保的属性或命名空间节点的父元素的边界参数位于在可以通过此方法匹配。This ensures that the parent element of the attribute or namespace node that the boundary parameter is positioned on can be matched by this method. - 如果方法将返回`false`的位置保持不变。If the method returns `false`, the position of the is unchanged. ## Examples 在以下示例中，移动从的根目录`contosoBooks.xml`到以下文件`book`元素。In the following example, the is moved from the root of the `contosoBooks.xml` file to the following `book` element. 克隆对象由使用方法，并且移动中`book`元素与以下`first-name`元素。A clone of the object is made using the method and is moved from the `book` element to the following `first-name` element. 克隆，它定位在`first-name`元素中，将使用作为边界。The cloned , positioned on the `first-name` element, will be used as a boundary. 克隆的位置中的更改不会影响原始。Changes in the position of the cloned do not affect the original . 原始然后尝试将移动到以下`price`元素使用与边界的方法作为参数传递。The original then attempts to move to the following `price` element using the method with the boundary passed as a parameter. 此移动失败，因为以下`price`元素不在边界。This move fails because the following `price` element is beyond the boundary. 原始然后尝试将移动到以下`title`元素它之前使用相同的方法的边界和成功。The original then attempts to move to the following `title` element which is before the boundary using the same method and succeeds. remarks.format: ## Remarks 预先计算的子节点将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的开头。Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果某个元素有三个子节点，预置的节点将成为第一个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node. 如果不存在子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 新的子节点不会插入直到方法的调用对象。The new child node is not inserted until the method of the object is called. - 方法是仅当定位在元素节点上。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，一个新`pages`的子元素的第一个列表的开头预置`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件中使用返回对象方法。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is prepended to the beginning of the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file using the object returned from the method. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#30)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#30)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 预先计算的子节点将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的开头。Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果某个元素有三个子节点，预置的节点将成为第一个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node. 如果不存在子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 若要创建新的元素节点，请在 XML 字符串参数中包括所有 XML 语法。To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter. 一个新的字符串`book`节点是`PrependChild("")`。The string for a new `book` node is `PrependChild("")`. 将文本"book"追加到当前节点的文本节点的字符串是`PrependChild("book")`。The string for appending the text "book" to the current node's text node is `PrependChild("book")`. 如果 XML 字符串包含多个节点，将添加所有节点。If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法是仅当定位在元素节点上。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，一个新`pages`的子元素的第一个列表的开头预置`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is prepended to the beginning of the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 预先计算的子节点将新节点添加到当前节点的子节点列表的开头。Prepending a child node adds the new node to the beginning of the list of child nodes for the current node. 例如，如果某个元素有三个子节点，预置的节点将成为第一个子节点。For example, when three child nodes exist for an element, the prepended node becomes the first child node. 如果不存在子节点，然后创建新的子节点。If no child nodes exist, then a new child node is created. 可以通过使用获取 Namespace 前缀和 URI 值或方法。Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained by using the or method. 例如，以下语法将子元素前面添加通过使用范围内命名空间`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:For example, the following syntax prepends a child element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ```csharp navigator.PrependChildElement(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` 这将创建新的子``元素。This creates the new child `` element. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果指定的命名空间前缀`null`或，然后从当前命名空间范围内获取命名空间 URI 的新元素的前缀。If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or , then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope. 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内没有命名空间前缀，则会自动生成的命名空间前缀。If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated. - 方法是仅当定位在元素节点上。The method is valid only when the is positioned on an element node. - 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 在以下示例中，一个新`pages`的子元素的第一个列表的开头预置`book`中的元素`contosoBooks.xml`文件。In the following example, a new `pages` child element is prepended to the beginning of the list of child elements of the first `book` element in the `contosoBooks.xml` file. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#34)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#34)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为当前节点及其子节点创建 对象时， 对象的 属性设置为 。When the object is created with the current node and its child nodes, the object's property is set to . 当首次调用 对象的 方法时， 移动到 的当前节点上。When the object's method is called for the first time, the is moved to the current node of the . 新的 对象继续执行读取操作，直到到达 XML 树的结尾为止。The new object continues to read until the end of the XML tree is reached. 此时， 方法返回 `false`， 对象的 属性设置为 。At this point, the method returns `false` and the object's property is set to . > [!NOTE] > 更改的位置对象不会影响的位置。Changing the position of the object does not affect the position of the . 当前节点的范围内命名空间的 Namespace 声明不会插入到 XML 流提供给对象。Namespace declarations for the in-scope namespaces of the current node are not inserted into the XML stream provided to the object. > [!NOTE] > 此行为不同于方法。This behavior differs from the method. 此方法创建具有特定读取器设置和使用此方法的模块对象具有不能控制这些设置。This method creates the object with specific reader settings, and the module that uses this method has no control over those settings. 例如，此方法返回的读取器禁止处理数据类型定义 (Dtd)。For example, the reader returned by this method prohibits processing Data Type Definitions (DTDs). 如果读取器将尝试读取使用 DTD 的文件，则会引发错误， 。If the reader attempts to read a file that uses a DTD, it will throw an error, . 异常的消息将是`Unexpected DTD declaration`。The message for the exception will be `Unexpected DTD declaration`. 可以通过实现自定义更改此行为，它返回与所需。You can change this behavior by implementing a custom that returns an with the desired . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法在第一天`book`元素的`contosoBooks.xml`文件。The following example illustrates using the method on the first `book` element of the `contosoBooks.xml` file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所选内容的上下文是位置时调用此方法。The context for the selection is the position of the when this method is called. 调用此方法后返回表示所选节点集。After calling this method, the returned represents the set of selected nodes. 使用方法的来循环访问所选的节点集。Use method of the to iterate over the selected node set. 下面的 C# 代码循环访问选定节点集。The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes. ```csharp XPathNodeIterator iterator = nav.Select("/bookstore/book"); while (iterator.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(Iterator.Current.Name); } ``` 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 您仍可以使用任一对象的导航方法内移动。You can still use any of the object's navigation methods to move within the . 导航方法都是独立于在所选节点。The navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the . - 调用未来方法返回一个新指向所选的节点集相匹配的新对象调用。Future calls to the method return a new object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new call. 这两个对象是完全相互独立。The two objects are completely independent of each other. - 如果 XPath 表达式需要命名空间解析，请使用重载，它将作为其参数。If the XPath expression requires namespace resolution, use the overload, which takes an as its argument. - 此方法不起作用的状态。This method has no effect on the state of the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来选择节点集。The following example uses the method to select a node set. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所选内容的上下文是位置调用此方法时。The context for the selection is the position of the when you called this method. 调用此方法之后,返回表示所选节点集。After you call this method, the returned represents the set of selected nodes. 使用上来循环访问所选的节点集。Use on the to iterate over the selected node set. 下面的 C# 代码循环访问选定节点集。The following C# code iterates over the selected set of nodes. ```csharp XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); while (ni.MoveNext()) { Console.WriteLine(ni.Current.Name); } ``` 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 您仍可以使用任一对象的导航方法内移动。You can still use any of the object's navigation methods to move within the . 导航方法都是独立于在所选节点。The navigation methods are independent of the selected nodes in the . - 调用未来方法返回一个新指向所选的节点集相匹配的新对象调用。Future calls to the method return a new object that points to the selected set of nodes that matches the new call. 这两个对象是完全相互独立。The two objects are completely independent of each other. - 如果需要命名空间解析、 前缀和命名空间 URI 对必须添加到，并必须在调用方法来指定要用于命名空间解析。If the requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to an , and the method must be called to specify the to use for namespace resolution. 例如，假设该文档包含以下 XML 节点。For example, suppose the document contains the following XML nodes. ```xml Pride And Prejudice ``` 下面的 C# 代码在这种情况下，选择`bk:ISBN`节点。In this case, the following C# code selects the `bk:ISBN` node. ```csharp XPathExpression expr = nav.Compile("book/@bk:ISBN"); XmlNamespaceManager mngr = new XmlNamespaceManager(new NameTable()); mngr.AddNamespace("bk","urn:samples"); expr.SetContext(mngr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果不包括一个前缀，则假定命名空间 URI 是空的命名空间。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace. 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，则仍必须使用方法，并提供，其中包含前缀和命名空间要处理的默认命名空间 URI。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace. 例如，假设有以下 XML。For example, suppose you have the following XML. ```xml Pride And Prejudice ``` 在这种情况下，下面的 C# 代码选择所有书节点：In this case, the following C# code selects all book nodes: ```csharp XmlNamespaceManager nsmgr = new XmlNamespaceManager(nav.NameTable); nsmgr.AddNamespace("ab", "http://www.lucernepublishing.com"); XPathExpression expr; expr = nav.Compile("//ab:book"); expr.SetContext(nsmgr); XPathNodeIterator ni = nav.Select(expr); ``` 此方法不起作用的状态。This method has no effect on the state of the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来选择节点集。The following example uses the method to select a node set. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以由实现提供"虚拟化"XML 查看一段的存储，以提供对基础对象的访问权限。The property can be used by implementations which provide a "virtualized" XML view over a store, to provide access to underlying objects. 例如，如果对象通过公共语言运行时 (CLR) 对象图提供虚拟的 XML 视图，你可能想要执行 XPath 查询使用方法，然后访问所选的节点的 CLR 对象。For example, if an object is used to provide a virtual XML view over a Common Language Runtime (CLR) object graph, you may wish to perform XPath queries using the method and then access the CLR objects underlying the selected nodes. 属性将公开这些基础对象。The property would expose these underlying objects. 在许多情况下，此值将为`null`，并返回的对象属性将始终为特定于实现的。In many cases, this value will be `null`, and the object returned by the property will always be implementation specific. 属性应保存对象标识和仅应该用于返回具有一对一的对应关系到各自的重叠项的对象。The property should preserve object identity and should only be used to return objects that have a one-to-one correspondence to their respective overlaid items. 用户应为相同的节点使用相同的连续访问始终获得相同的对象对象或一个克隆。A user should always get the same object on successive visits to the same node using the same object or a cloned one. > [!NOTE] > 的属性对象创建的对象返回的相应。The property of an object created by an object returns the corresponding .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有架构或类型信息 (例如，从对象使用 XML 架构验证初始化)，并且如果当前节点定义为 XML 架构`xs:integer`类型，属性返回当前节点的值作为未装箱对象。If the has schema or type information (for example, from an object initialized with an XML schema validating ), and if the current node is defined as an XML Schema `xs:integer` type, the property returns the current node's value as an unboxed object. 但是，如果不具有任何架构或类型信息，属性将转换到当前节点的字符串值值，根据 XPath 2.0 强制转换规则的`xs:integer`。However, if the does not have any schema or type information, the property attempts to convert the string value of the current node to a value, according to the XPath 2.0 casting rules for `xs:integer`. ## Examples 有关的示例属性，请参阅属性。For an example of the property, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取.NET Framework的当前节点的类型化值。The property gets the .NET Framework of the typed value of the current node. 例如，类型的元素`xs:int`必须的默认情况下。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 但是，可能是任何一种可以映射到有效类型`xs:int`如或。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int` such as or . 如果节点没有类型，这相当于节点上的类型批注`xdt:untypedAtomic`。If a node has no type, this is equivalent to the type annotation on the node being `xdt:untypedAtomic`. 在这种情况下，属性将返回节点字符串。In this case, the property returns a string for the node. 有关详细信息，请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md). ## Examples 在以下示例中， `contosoBooks.xml` XML 文件和`contosoBooks.xsd`XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构用于创建对象。In the following example, the `contosoBooks.xml` XML file and `contosoBooks.xsd` XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema are used to create an object. 类型化的值`price`使用显示元素属性，然后返回作为字符串使用方法。The typed value of the `price` element is displayed using the property and then returned as a string using the method. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CPP/xpathnavigatorproperties.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/CS/xpathnavigatorproperties.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorProperties#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorProperties/VB/xpathnavigatorproperties.vb#6)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as an input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ``` 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前节点的范围内命名空间的 Namespace 声明插入到 XML 的流式传输到指定的对象。Namespace declarations for the in-scope namespaces of the current node are inserted into the XML streamed to the object specified. 例如，如果调用方法的第一个`book`元素的`books.xml`文件中，`http://www.contoso.com/books`命名空间声明在 XML 文档的顶部进行流式传输到在 XML 中将显示指定的对象如下面的示例中所示。For example, if the method is called on the first `book` element of the `books.xml` file, the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace declaration made at the top of the XML document will appear in the XML streamed to the object specified as shown in the following example. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 ``` > [!NOTE] > 方法不会影响的位置。The method does not affect the position of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法在第一天`book`元素的`contosoBooks.xml`文件。The following example illustrates using the method on the first `book` element of the `contosoBooks.xml` file.
